description:
Make the curls off Tofino or Lawrencetown feel like Maui. This cold-weather wetsuit provides neck-to-ankle coverage. A combo of super-stretchy neoprene and expert patterning gives you a full range of motion. The unbeatable price lets you stock the Delica with more than budget noodles.

  • 4mm stretch neoprene provides, comfort and mobility
  • 4mm skin panels on chest and back improve heat retention around your body core
  • Underarm panels are 3mm neoprene with spandex for unrestricted swimming or paddling
  • Internal anti-flush neck gasket and panel prevents the spine-chilling bellows effect
  • Taped inner cuffs ensure wrists and ankles won't bag out with age
  • Reinforced knees add abrasion resistance
  • Curved seams are glued and sealed, then reinforced at all critical points. No seam allowance keeps the inside surface smooth
  • #10 YKK back zipper with long pull cord and drain holes at bottom
  • Printed interior graphics with a collage of surf themes and the motto "Think warm thoughts."
name: MEC Fusion 4/3mm Neoprene Wetsuit - Men's
